Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "So that's the Polyphage... It's way too big!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I say we move forward stealthily if possible...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Polyphage seems to have been expecting your arrival. It sends a powerful shock wave your way with an incredible roar.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "All hands, brace yourself for the shock! Don't fall into the Red Tide! Protect Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant and I are okay. That was one powerful roar, though...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We can't even get close to it now. We need to disable it temporarily somehow.", 4: '1'}
